answers.answer: How far along are you? I got migraines CONSTANTLY....like debilitating migraines between 8 and 14 weeks. I tried everything but nothing worked. Finally they just let up one day. I'm sorry I couldn't help. I just took Tylenol and bathes but like u it didn't work.
I am just about 10 weeks along

During my first trimester I had really bad headaches, and I called my doctor and they told me to drink plenty of water. I wasn't drinking 8 glass of water a day. Also I drank gatorade. I used Vicks vapor rub on my temples and gently rub it. It helped me out. Also eat something every 2 to 3 hours. This helped me. Hope this helps.
I'm 13 weeks pregnant with triplets and I'm constantly having headaches too. I tried bathe and Tylenol too. Doesn't help too. I tried to ignore headaches and keep myself busy.

Yes. You can call your doctor and update them. Headaches like that can indicate high blood pressure and preeclampsia- very serious condition that needs frequent monitoring. With health concerns it is best to not rely on people on the internet- call your doc or go to the er.
They can call youn something for it they did for me

I am 12wks and I've been getting serious headaches and migraines recently that have me so messed up I had to stay inside. Tylenol didn't work although I still took it, I tried cold compress on the back of my neck and forehead, the peace and quiet no lights nothing worked until I fell asleep. If and when I got to sleep the migraine wasn't felt, but then I woke up and it would gradually come right back. Sorry your going through that, but it's a part of pregnancy. Hope you get better
I got really bad headaches around 20 weeks... I was the same way I tryed everything I ended up going in and they gave me a shot in my hip for the pain

Same thing happen to me. I suffer from migraines and unfortunalety the medicine tht would control my migraines couldnt take anymore due to being pregnant. I was prescribed percoset from my ob and I ABSOLUTELY REFUSED TO TAKE A NARCOTIC WHILE PREGNANT so i went the natural ways which really really helped me. At the pharmacy they sell a roll on migraine stick that is all natural oils i used that w cool patches from migraines for when you havr fevers and that did wonders for me!! Deff deff get the roll on its all natural and gives you a soothen refief hope it helps!
Your hormones changing can cause really bad headaches. The doctor or er will give you something. If the Dr wont than the er will
Poweraid or Gatorade.  Something about the electro lights . My husband always runs out and gets me one every time I have a headache . Works eveytime! Good luck!!!

Don't rule out a sinus headache, I get them often, not quite a migraine but worse then a regular headache. I woukd suggest you take something for your sinuses and see if that helps. While pregnant, you don't need a stuffy nose for it to be your sinuses. Good luck and I hope you feel better soon!
Thanks for your ideas. I go to the doc. On the 4th I'll tell him about them then
Rub Tiger Balm on your temples and message. Also, if you don't mi d it in your hair, do the same to the affected areas. You can buy it in the pain relief section at most drug stores. Good luck!

I saw a specialist for my migraines while I was pregnant because I've suffered from them since I was 4yo. Max does of Tylenol DAILY is a thousand milligrams. Take all of it at one time with benadryl or promethezine if you have it. If it doesn't work take two Excedrin migraine. Although it contains aspirin, if taken sparingly (once or twice a month) it won't hurt. If it still doesn't work go to the hospital. Keeping your body under stress is just as bad for the baby as not seeking treatment.

SODA !! I had and still get migrains in my pregnancy I'm 22 weeks and they are the worst i tried everything to till I tried soda drink a soda and relax and mine goes away it works wounders for me so good luck I won't take meds bc I dont want it effecting baby so if your like me try a soda when you get one I heard from other moms in my town the caffeine in the soda helps ....good luck :)
Thanks for the ideas. I am now 15 weeks and get them about once a week

question: I know you guys are not doctors but maybe you can helpI've been having a real bad headache for last 2 day.i have took a Tylenol every 6 hours, I have tried relaxing in the tub, I Tryed laying with the lights off that does not work. I even have to try putting a cool wash rag on my head and being were its quite the does not work.Any ideas what I can do?
title: help
